channel.title: movies on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in movies on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Frames of Reference
item.description: A colleague of mine is taking German lessons and when the topic of poetry came up at lunch, he described Elftans, and their structure. It reminded me a little of Haiku so I said ¨Sounds like the European version of Haiku¨.

item.title: A Study of Communalism and Identity
item.description: A Study of Communalism and Identity (First published in May 2008) I Identities Preferences and Behaviour Where does the self come from? Identity and our definitions of our ‘self’ are a result of what we’ve been taught from the beginning of our lives.

item.title: Arranged Marriage
item.description: Arranged marriage is an old concept. It existed long before people accepted love (that occurred before marriage) as a valid reason to marry. The process through which this changed is reflected very well in the movie ‘Fiddler on the Roof’.

item.title: Types of Love: An Analysis.
item.description: It is perhaps important to differentiate the various meaning that we refer to when we say the word love. Often ‘love’ is used in the place of a more suitable word.

item.title: Tamil Songs Translated
item.description: Tamil Songs Translated is an archive where all Tamil songs I have translated can be found. Why don’t you take a look now? Categories/Lyrics Translations[
